name: sync-test-docs
description: Scan test files and verify/update corresponding design docs' Testing tables to prevent coverage drift

testFiles.description: List of test files to scan (optional, scans all if empty)

dryRun.description: If true, only report what would be changed without applying

autoFix.description: If true, automatically update docs when drift detected

syncReport.description: Report of sync status with drift details and proposed fixes

updatedDocs.description: List of docs that were updated
